oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Using Chem-Cast to Dehorn Baby Calves
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hilton, W. Mark
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Chem-Cast
baby calves
dehorn
Brown Swiss calves
herd health program
dehorning paste
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: I began using Chem-Cast (Bio-Ceutic, 88% Lactic Acid USP) to dehorn baby calves about 18 month ago. I began my experiment with a few Brown Swiss calves owned by a client on a monthly dairy herd health program. The owner had used dehorning paste in years previously with only limited success and it was my hope that I could teach him and others how to dehorn with Chem-Cast.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1986; 198-199
